thread.title: Calvin Hampton
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Calvin Hampton

author: Calvin Hampton
title: Calvin Hampton
text:
I ordered the RS Taichi TI Armed High Protection Mesh Jacket RSJJ12 Black/Gun Metal
(Select Size: Japan XX-Large from STG. Not only was the sizing chart easy to comprehend but the product fit true to form as advertised. I am absolutely impressed with the quality and durability of my purchase. And I will definitely be a returning customer when looking to get information about products or apparel but mainly for future purchase.
